Detailed Description

Directed rectangle representing bounding rectangle und orientation of a column.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum QwtColumnRect::Direction

Direction of the column.

Enumerator:
LeftToRight 

From left to right.

RightToLeft 

From right to left.

BottomToTop 

From bottom to top.

TopToBottom 

From top to bottom.
